name: User can see the detail page of each product -- @1.6

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a user with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
When I visit the inventory page
And I click on the product with name "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"

Then I should see the detail page of the product wit all its content and the correct product name "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)", "$15.99", "This classic Sauce Labs t-shirt is perfect to wear when cozying up to your keyboard to automate a few tests. Super-soft and comfy ringspun combed cotton."

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: This classic Sauce Labs t-shirt is perfect to wear when cozying up to your keyboard to automate a few tests. Super-soft and comfy ringspun combed cotton.

fullName: Detail page functionallity test: User can see the detail page of each product
